titleStmt.title: A disingag'd survey of the engagement. In relation to publike obligations. 1. Precedent, 2. Present, in the oaths of allegiance and supremacy, the protestation, and Covenant, and under the present juncture of affaires.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Wright, at the Kings Head in the Old-Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Feb: 7 1649"; the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the Old-Bayley
